name: fox-pilot
description: Firefox extension for remote browser control by coding agents

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:cli
scripts.build:host:all: bun build packages/native-host/src/host.ts --compile --outfile packages/native-host-darwin-arm64/bin/fox-pilot-host && echo 'Note: Cross-compilation not supported. Run on each target platform.'
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version --workspaces && npm run version:sync-manifest
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version --workspaces && npm run version:sync-manifest
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm version major --no-git-tag-version --workspaces && npm run version:sync-manifest
scripts.version:sync-manifest: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const pkg = require('./package.json'); const m = 'packages/extension/src/manifest.json'; const manifest = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(m)); manifest.version = pkg.version; fs.writeFileSync(m, JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2) + '\n');"

author: Titouan Mathis
